name: Automation or SOAR Events Overview
description: sumologic_system_events from automation service or SOAR
title: Automation or SOAR Events Overview

panels.title: Event Log All Types With JSON Payloads

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=oar*  {{keywords}}
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
// 
| count as events by _messagetime,eventname,subsystem,item_name,type,identity_json,details
| sort _messagetime | fields -events

_sourcecategory=oar*  {{keywords}}
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"

// 
| count as events by eventname 
| sort events

_sourcecategory=oar*  {{keywords}}
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"


| count as events by subsystem 
| sort events

panels.title: About
panels.text:
This dashboard surfaces Cloud SOAR or Automation service audit events in the sumologic_system_events index. For more info on auditing see: https://help.sumologic.com/docs/cloud-soar/audit-event-index/

You can filter results using the keywords parameter by supplying any valid keyword expression such as:
```
IncidentCreated
( TaskUpdated or PlaybookExecutionCreated or AppCentralPackageCreated)
user1@foobar.com
(task* and *updated)
```

panels.title: Events Over Time By  Type and item Name

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=oar*  {{keywords}}
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+)" nodrop
// 
| concat (type," - ",item_name ) as item
| timeslice {{graph_timeslice}}
| count as events by item ,_timeslice
| transpose row _timeslice column item

//| sort _messagetime | fields -events

panels.title: Event Breakdown Per Type and Item

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=oar*  {{keywords}}
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+)" nodrop
// 
| min(_messagetime) as earliest,max(_messagetime) as latest,count as events by eventname,subsystem,item_name,type
| sort events //| fields -events
| formatdate(tolong(earliest),"yy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss ZZZ" ) as earliest
| formatdate(tolong(latest),"yy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss ZZZ" ) as latest

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}}
 PlaybookExecutionUpdated Completed  
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//
| json field=details "start" nodrop
| json field=details "end" nodrop
| json field=details "running_id" as id
| json field=details "type"
| json field=details "status"
| json field=details "playbook_name"
| (end - start) as duration
| count as events by _messagetime,status,playbook_name,id,type,duration
| sort _messagetime | fields -events

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}} errors
 PlaybookExecution  
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//

| json field=details "running_id" as id
| json field=details "type"
| json field=details "status"
| json field=details "playbook_name"

| count as events by _messagetime,eventname,status,playbook_name,id,type
| sort _messagetime | fields -events

panels.title: Playbook Errors Over Time By Playbook

queries.queryString:
_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}} errors
 PlaybookExecution  
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//

| json field=details "running_id" as id
| json field=details "type"
| json field=details "status"
| json field=details "playbook_name"
| timeslice {{graph_timeslice}}
| count as events by _timeslice,playbook_name | transpose row _timeslice column playbook_name

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}} 
 PlaybookExecutionUpdated Completed  
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//

| json field=details "running_id" as id
| json field=details "type"
| json field=details "status"
| json field=details "playbook_name"

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}} 
 PlaybookExecutionStarted
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//

| json field=details "running_id" as id
| json field=details "type"
| json field=details "status"
| json field=details "playbook_name"
| timeslice 
| count as events by _timeslice,playbook_name | transpose row _timeslice column playbook_name

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}}
 AutomationAction*
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//
| json field=details "automation_engine" nodrop
| json field=details "error" nodrop
| json field=details "rule_id" as rule_id
| json field=details "rule_name"
| json field=details "status" nodrop
| json field=details "name"
//
| count as events by _messagetime,eventname,status,name,rule_id,rule_name,error
| sort _messagetime | fields -events

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}}
 AutomationActionUpdated
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//
| json field=details "automation_engine" nodrop
| json field=details "error" nodrop | where !(isempty(error))
| json field=details "rule_id" as rule_id
| json field=details "rule_name"
| json field=details "status" nodrop
| json field=details "name"
//
| count as events by _messagetime,eventname,status,name,rule_id,rule_name,error
| sort _messagetime | fields -events

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}} errors
 PlaybookExecutionUpdated
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//

| json field=details "running_id" as id
| json field=details "type"
| json field=details "status"
| json field=details "playbook_name"

| count as errors by status,playbook_name | sort errors

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}}
 AutomationActionUpdated
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//
| json field=details "automation_engine" nodrop
| json field=details "error" nodrop | where !(isempty(error))
| json field=details "rule_id" as rule_id
| json field=details "rule_name"
| json field=details "status" nodrop
| json field=details "name"
//
| count as errors by name,rule_name,error | sort errors

_sourcecategory=oar* {{keywords}}
 PlaybookExecutionUpdated Completed  
AND _view = sumologic_system_events

| json field=_raw "eventName"
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "severityLevel"
// actual fields vary by audit event type
// we need to merge them to a single value

// for many types we can get them with one regex
// "ReportIdentity": {"name": "Inc_details"},
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *\{[^\}]+name\": *\"(?<item_name>[^\"]+)" nodrop

| json field=_raw "TaskIdentity.title" as t_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentInvestigatorIdentity.username" as iii_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentIdentity.incidentid" as i_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "EntityIdentity.id" as e_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "IncidentNoteIdentity.title" as ini_name nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.value" as e_value nodrop
| json field=_raw "Entity.type" as e_type nodrop
| json field=_raw "AppCentralPackage.name" as a_name nodrop

| if(isempty(iii_name),item_name,iii_name) as item2_name
| if(isempty(t_name),item_name,t_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(i_name),item_name,i_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_name),item_name,e_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(ini_name),item_name,ini_name) as item_name
| if(isempty(e_value),item_name,concat(e_type," ",e_value)) as item_name
| if(isempty(a_name),item_name,a_name) as item_name

// etc
| parse regex field = _raw "\"[a-zA-z0-9]+Identity\": *(?<identity_json>\{[^\}]+\}), \"(?<type>[^\"]+)\": *(?<details>\{[^\}]+\})" nodrop
//
| json field=details "start" nodrop
| json field=details "end" nodrop
| json field=details "running_id" as id
| json field=details "type"
| json field=details "status"
| json field=details "playbook_name"
| (end - start) as duration
| timeslice {{graph_timeslice}}
| pct(duration,1,25,50,75,100), min(duration),max(duration) by _timeslice

sourceDefinition.values: // any keyword expression for audit events
